name: Fasten
description:
Your priceless, one-of-a-kind, solid plastic 56k modem signed by Sir Tim Berners-Lee himself has been lost in your eternally-growing pile of defunct electronics that only 90's kids will remember. Now you must dig through your hoarded 'antique treasures' to find it again -- but don't damage anything in the process!

Use your grappling hook to propel yourself to the bottom of the pile and try to maximize your score!
